IOT.IOTApplication

Interface IOTApplicationInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlarmClockService

    public interface IOTApplicationInterface
    Interface for all application implementations to include handling of incoming Notifications as well as sending them to the Subscribers.
    Version:
    Milestone1
    Author:
    Peter Klosowski (a1403029)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getServiceDescription()
      Returns the application's service description which will be broadcast over the network via UDP.
      void handleIncomingNotification(IOTMessage message)
      Handles a received package and starts an event if triggered.
      boolean isInterested(java.lang.String broadcast)
      Returns if application is interested to subscribe.

    • Method Detail

      • handleIncomingNotification

        void handleIncomingNotification(IOTMessage message)
        Handles a received package and starts an event if triggered.
        Parameters:
        message - Message type and ID of the application with optional text

      • getServiceDescription

        java.lang.String getServiceDescription()
        Returns the application's service description which will be broadcast over the network via UDP.
        Returns:
        String containing a service description.

      • isInterested

        boolean isInterested(java.lang.String broadcast)
        Returns if application is interested to subscribe.
        Parameters:
        broadcast - ID of broadcast from client
        Returns:
        true if subscription is desirable
